{{note.label}}
{{note.description}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Note } from '../note'; @Component({ selector: 'app-story', templateUrl: './story.component.html', styleUrls: ['./story.component.css'] }) export class StoryComponent { notes: Note[] = [ {label: "Server side", description: "Write a serving get/post requests REST API"}, {label: "Client side", description: "Frontend Web Applictation"}] }
